languages.text: {n}Пожав плечами, Джай кокетливо взирает на вас из под темной пряди.{/n} "Не иначе сам Великий вложил ему в уста слова истины, шерин".
{n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Пожав плечами, Джай кокетливо взирает на вас из под темной пряди.{/n} "Не иначе сам Великий вложил ему в уста слова истины, шерин".

traits.locale_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Encogiéndose de hombros, Jae te lanza una mirada coqueta a través de una cortina de pelo.{/n} «El mismísimo Exaltado debe de haberle ordenado que proclame la verdad, shereen».
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Encogiéndose de hombros, Jae te lanza una mirada coqueta a través de una cortina de pelo.{/n} «El mismísimo Exaltado debe de haberle ordenado que proclame la verdad, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊耸了耸肩，一双明眸从黑发间娇媚地注视着你。{/n}“肯定是至高无上的神皇亲自将真理之言放入它的口中了吧，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊耸了耸肩，一双明眸从黑发间娇媚地注视着你。{/n}“肯定是至高无上的神皇亲自将真理之言放入它的口中了吧，亲爱的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは肩をすくめ、暗い色の髪の後ろから甘えたようにあなたを見つめる。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワン自身がその口に真実の言葉を言わせたんだね、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは肩をすくめ、暗い色の髪の後ろから甘えたようにあなたを見つめる。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワン自身がその口に真実の言葉を言わせたんだね、シャリーン」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae hausse les épaules et vous adresse un regard aguicheur à travers le voile noir de ses cheveux.{/n} « Il faut croire que l'Exalté lui-même lui a soufflé quelque vérité cachée, shereen. »
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae hausse les épaules et vous adresse un regard aguicheur à travers le voile noir de ses cheveux.{/n} « Il faut croire que l'Exalté lui-même lui a soufflé quelque vérité cachée, shereen. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae zuckt mit den Schultern und blickt dich von hinter einem dunklen Vorhang aus Haaren kokett an.{/n} "Die Worte der Wahrheit müssen vom Erhabenen selbst stammen, Shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae zuckt mit den Schultern und blickt dich von hinter einem dunklen Vorhang aus Haaren kokett an.{/n} "Die Worte der Wahrheit müssen vom Erhabenen selbst stammen, Shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."

languages.text: {n}Jae omuz silkiyor ve siyah saçlarının meydana getirdiği perdenin ardından cilveyle seni süzüyor.{/n} "Bu doğruları ona Görkemli'nin bizzat kendisi söyletmiş olsa gerek şirinim."
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae eyes you coquettishly from behind a dark curtain of hair.{/n} "The Exalted One Himself must have put the words of truth into its mouth, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae omuz silkiyor ve siyah saçlarından oluşan bir perdenin ardından cilveli cilveli seni süzüyor.{/n} "Ağzına bu gerçekleri Görkemli'nin bizzat kendisi koymuş olsa gerek şirinim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
